mapper.select:
select pac.firstname as nome , pac.lastname as sobrenome , pac.gender__pc as genero , pac.personbirthdate as dataNascimento , pac.age__c as idade , pac.personmobilephone as telefone , pac.personemail as email , pac.cpf__c as cpf , pac.billingpostalcode as cep , pac.billingstreet as endereco , pac.row_id as idconnex
from process.account pac where pac.row_id = #{rowId}

select pac.modelname__c as modelo , pac.enginetype__c as motor , pac.latestmileage__c as transmissao , pac.x_license_plate__c as versao , pac.vehiclecolor__c as cor , pac.purchaseprice__c as preco from process.asset pac where pac.contact_row_id__c = #{rowId}

select sr.protocol__c as protocolo , pc.dealercode__c as codigoConcessionaria , sr.origin as origem , sr.method as metodo , sr.legacy_created as dataAbertura , pc.firstname||' '||pc.lastname as nomeResponsavel , sr.status as status , 'high' as prioridade , 'Y' as identificacaoPCD , pc.type as tipoContato , 'Y' as clienteHyundai , sr.usedcar_as_down_payment__c as usadoNaTroca , pc.corporaterepresentativename__c as nomeConcessionaria , pc.cust_stat_cd__c as statusConcessionaria , sr.method as metodoContato , sr.description as observacoesContato , sr.x_camp_id__c as dadosCampanha , sr.source_tag__c as sourceTag , sr.medium_tag__c as mediumTag , sr.content_tag__c as contentTag , sr.form__c as form from process.service_request sr join process.account pc on sr.contact_row_id__c = pc.row_id where sr.protocol__c = #{protocol}

select wants_loan__c as querFinanciar , loan_type__c as tipoFinanciamento , down_payment__c as valorEntradaFinanciamento , installments_amt__c as qtdParcelaFinanciamento from process.service_request sr where sr.protocol__c = #{protocol}

select '0' as temperatureNum , predictive_temp__c as temperature from process.opportunity where protocol__c = #{protocol} union all select temperaturenumber__c as temperatureNum ,predictivetemp__c as temperature FROM process.sales_consult_history where protocol__c = #{protocol} order by temperatureNum asc
select sch.temperaturenumber__c as tipoAgendamento , sch.description_interaction__c as dataAgendamento from process.sales_consult_history sch where protocol__c = #{protocol}

select interactionstartdate__c as firstInteractionDate , statussales__c as saleStatus , reason__c as reason , result__c as result , salespersoncode__c as saleCPF , dmsenddate__c as endDate , dmsreceivedate__c as dlrReceiveDate , dealerrespondetime__c as dlrResponseTime from process.sales_consult_history where protocol__c = #{protocol} order by interactionnumber__c desc limit 1

select interactionnumber__c as interactionNum , first_interaction_date__c as date , description_interaction__c as description , case when contact_flag__c = true then 'Y' else 'N' end as contactCustomer from process.sales_consult_history where protocol__c = #{protocol} order by interactionnumber__c asc

select usedcar_as_down_payment__c as usadoNaTroca , usedcar_brand__c as usadoMarca , usedcar_model__c as usadoModelo , usedcar_year__c as usadoAno , usedcar_km__c as usadoKM , usedcar_plate__c as usadoExpectativaValor , usedcar_color__c as usadoCor , payment_status__c as usadoPlaca , usedcar_chassi__c as usadoChassi , usedcar_version__c as usadoVersao , usedcar_min_price__c as usadoPrecoMin , usedcar_max_price__c as usadoPrecoMax , usedcar_mid_price__c as usadoPrecoMed from process.service_request where protocol__c = #{protocol}
